quest.name: Two Scoops
journal: Rumor has reached Ingaret that someone has seen sorbets somewhere in the local area. Verify whether or not these rumors are true by finding the person who sighted these creatures and confirming their story.

You speak with Tourcenet and he assures you that he saw sorbets at Red Rim. They should be dealt with quickly, before they get out of hand. Travel to Red Rim and slay some of the beasts to keep their numbers in check.
You have killed four of the monsters. That should keep them under control for the time being. Return to Ingaret and let her know that the rumors were true.

Ingaret thanks you for both confirming the rumors and slaying several of the sorbets, too. Sorbets do not normally live in this area, and Ingaret is unable to offer any explanation as to why they are there. She does seem to have a hunch─one she chooses not to disclose.

dialogue.name: INGARET
dialogue.text: You're still looking to help out? I'm sorry, but there's not really anything we need─wait, no. Yes, there is something you can do for me.

dialogue.name: INGARET
dialogue.text: So, apparently, someone saw a bunch of sorbets wandering around nearby. There aren't supposed to be sorbets living around here, but if these rumors are true, we'll need to kill them off quickly before they get out of hand.

dialogue.name: INGARET
dialogue.text: Please look into this for me. Whoever saw the creatures must be around here somewhere. See if you can find them and confirm their story.

dialogue.name: INGARET
dialogue.text: Try and find whoever it is that spotted sorbets in the area. They reproduce quickly, so if these rumors are true, we'll need to kill them off quickly.

dialogue.name: TOURCENET
dialogue.text: You're asking if I saw sorbets nearby? I'm curious to know what prompted you to ask such a question. Besides, nobody I tell actually believes me anyway. But I'm sure they were sorbets. I saw them wandering around Red Rim, just south of the Convictory.

dialogue.name: TOURCENET
dialogue.text: But we can't just let them be. Those things multiply so quickly, so it won't be long before the snowfields are filled with those disgusting creatures. Please kill some of them. Killing four should be enough for now─just to keep their numbers down so they don't get out of hand.

dialogue.name: TOURCENET
dialogue.text: I saw the sorbets wandering around Red Rim, just south of the Convictory. Please kill four of them so that their numbers don't get out of hand. They multiply so quickly that they will overrun the whole of Coerthas if left unchecked.

dialogue.name: INGARET
dialogue.text: So there really were sorbets nearby? Thank you for thinning their numbers. That should keep them in check long enough for us to send a squad to make sure they're fully eliminated. I shall have to notify Ser Redwald immediately.

dialogue.name: INGARET
dialogue.text: But there's not supposed to be any sorbets around here! I guess we were just misinformed...unless... But whatever the case, we clearly need better reconnaissance and intelligence.

obj.n: He Who Would Not Be Denied
